Reviews.Title: “Good choice for the price.”
Reviews.Author: chugzy
Reviews.Content: armada located keizersgracht near amstel river blocks rembrandtplein amsterdam 4th floor view canal hotel amsterdam comfortable price 80 euros night equipped combo fairly lcd tv hotel offered buffet breakfast included price hotel elevator laughingly slow hold button moving overall complaints 5 euros night hellhole stayed couple weeks earlier

Reviews.Content: hotel stated blurb triple airy barely beds sit bed move wardrobe space minimal ensuite bathroom wet pod corner decor dreadful windows rotting frames paint scratched chipped carpets clean replaced travelled elderly relative 2nd floor lift person time floor button held time lift stopped hotel location breakfast joke continental sparse uninteresting coffee worth price paid roughly person 3 night stay
